ListCtrl.Name: meidaAnalysisLst
ListCtrl.Heading: 座席号,50;订购数,50;进线数,50;成单率,20;眼贴,20;蓝莓,20;回线数,50;

DbDetails.DbTable: shop_order_detail as d inner join shop_order as o on d.o_id=o.o_id inner join shop_product as p on p.p_id=d.p_id
DbDetails.Data: o.o_jobno as 坐席号,sum(case when p.p_name=14 then d.p_num else 0 end) as 眼贴,sum(case when p.p_name=23 then d.p_num else 0 end) as 蓝霉
DbDetails.queryFormat: select * from (select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by o_jobno) as b

DbDetails.Data: s.SeatsNo as 坐席号,count(g.callerid) as 进线数
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from (select distinct callerid,max(calledid) as calledid,max(cdrid) as cdrid from gwcalls where starttime>'%{DateTimeStart}' and starttime<'%{DateTimeEnd}' and calleeid!='' and duration!=0 group by callerid) as g inner join gwcalls as gw on g.cdrid=gw.cdrid inner join userlogin as u on gw.calledid=u.user_name inner join seatsinfo as s on u.agentid=s.ID %{where} group by seatsNo

DbDetails.DbTable: (select * from shop_history where h_dt between '%{DateTimeStart}' and '%{DateTimeEnd}') as h left outer join SeatsInfo on SeatsInfo.SeatsNo=h.seatsno
DbDetails.Data: h.seatsno as 坐席号,sum(case when h.callOrderType<4 then 1 else 0 end) as 订购数,sum(case when h.h_mt=40 then 0 else 1 end) as 回线数,convert(float,sum(case when h.callOrderType<4 then 1 else 0 end))/convert(float,count(*)) as 成单率
DbDetails.queryFormat: select %{data} from %{dbtable} where %{where} group by h.seatsno order by 订购数 desc
